attributes.action: enusre that the 10 year anniversary of Diana's death is marked appropriately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think it is inapropiate that Camilla Parker-Bowles is to attend.  We feel that a minister that actually knew her should deliver the service. The location for the memorial service should be large enough to hold at least all of her friends who wish to remember her and pay their respects to her.
